full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI SKAR LNGA PO'I BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES YE SHES MI SKAR LNGA YI MCHOD THABS DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA BSKAL BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS DNGUL GYI BKRA SHIS RTAGS BRGYAD RGYAL SRID SNA BDUN LHA DAR DANG BCAS PA BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^ 'BRAS SPUNGS 'DUL BA MKHAN PO'I YANG SPRUL MING 'DZIN DKON MCHOG YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'I SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
